translations: v．使窒息：导致无法呼吸，通常由于氧气不足或呼吸道受阻。
· The smoke from the fire asphyxiates the people trapped inside the building.
火灾产生的烟雾使被困在建筑物内的人窒息。

sentences.sentence: Some substances attack the brain stem causing a cessation of the breath so that one simply asphyxiates.
sentences.translation: 一些物质攻击脑干引起呼吸停止，并产生窒息。
